update address set add_name = #{addName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subdistrict = #{subdistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, communities = #{communities,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, street = #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_num_prefix = #{houseNumPrefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_num = #{houseNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_num_postfix = #{houseNumPostfix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auxiliary_num = #{auxiliaryNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auxiliary_num_postfix = #{auxiliaryNumPostfix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, community_name = #{communityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_num_prefix = #{buildingNumPrefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_num = #{buildingNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_num_postfix = #{buildingNumPostfix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_num = #{unitNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_num = #{roomNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_num_postfix = #{roomNumPostfix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subsidiary_add = #{subsidiaryAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, poi = #{poi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cam_poi = #{camPoi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cam_heading = #{camHeading,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cam_pitch = #{camPitch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_type = #{addType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, floor_height = #{floorHeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, floor_poi = #{floorPoi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, miniheading = #{miniheading,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, floor_heading = #{floorHeading,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_date = #{addDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where add_id = #{addId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.*, n.* from address a, net n where a.pid = n.net_id and a.add_type = #{addType}

select B.roomcode from (select *, regexp_split_to_array(t.poi,',') as AAA from address t ) B where ST_Contains(ST_PolygonFromText('POLYGON((${poi}))'),(ST_PointFromText('POINT('||AAA[1]||' '||AAA[2]||')')))
